EmailTemplate.name: Next Steps
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for completing the Practice Privileges application
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for completing the Practice Privileges application
Having trouble viewing this email? Click here
Congratulations! You’re on your way to practice growth
Dear {!PP_Workshop_Member__c.Doctors_Name__c}
We're excited that you see value in the program and we look forward to serving you. Our mission is designed to help grow the dental practices of the PracticePrivileges members and we're ready to get the ball rolling on your behalf.
In the next 7-10 days, our partners will be reaching out to you for:
ClearVantage set-up and training ClearConnect installation ClearTrain overview and instructions
Our team is available to you to answer any questions you may have so please feel free to reach out to us.
Nathaly Ambos Manager - Practice Development 303-729-5054
Jordan Schaffel Director - Practice Development 512-743-4400
Dan Hinkle VP - Practice Development 714-319-0364
Thanks again and welcome! The PracticePrivileges Team
ClearChoice Holdings, LLC 8350 E. Crescent Parkway, Suite 100 Greenwood Village, CO 80111 800-617-0705
